nodes.text: Sacrifices is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on August 12, 2004 and described a gathering Tarasin Mothers in the jungles for a sacred ritual. Many of the gathered Mothers believed they had been called by Dariana, but in actuality they were called by a Tattooed Jedi. He asked them to begin the "Shorda'ki," a ritual that involved self-sacrifice for the greater good.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, Force-Adept player-characters gained Force bonuses while conducting adventures on Cularin, Rennokk, or Tilnes.
